Package harrygpotter.tombola.tombolalib

Interface ITLogger

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TSimpleLogger
    public interface ITLogger
    Simple (maybe too simple in this release) interface used by other TombolaLib objects to trace their activities both during the card series generation phase (ITSetFactory objects) and the simulated/assisted tombola games (TGame objects). An interface is used to let TombolaLib users to provide their custom implementation of ITLogger objects. Currently the library provide a first practical implementation (see TSimpleLogger) to log on plain text files or on standard console output.
    Since:
    1.8
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Harry G. Potter harry.g.potter@gmail.com
    See Also:
    ITSetFactory, TGame, TSimpleLogger

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static class  ITLogger.TLogLevel
      As usual, define the discrete "levels" of importance for messages passed to ITlogger instances, in order to prioritize them and decide if they must be logged or not based on the log level set for each logger.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void error​(String msg)
      Send the msg string to the logger with a default log level set to TLogLevel.ERROR.
      void fatal​(String msg)
      Send the msg string to the logger with a default log level set to TLogLevel.FATAL.
      void gameLog​(ITLogger.TLogLevel level, String gameId, int count, int extractedNum, String msg)
      Helper method interface that allows for "separate fields" log entries to be written specially by TGame objects during tombola matches, for instance on database tables storing each info in separate table columns.
      ITLogger.TLogLevel getLevel()
      Return the "level" up to the log messages passed to this logger will be traced (that is, saved on a file, printed, stored on a database).
      void info​(String msg)
      Send the msg string to the logger with a default log level set to TLogLevel.INFO.
      void log​(ITLogger.TLogLevel level, String msg)
      Send the msg string to the logger using the specified level of attention. The message will be traced only if the log level of the logger is higher or equal to the log level of the message.
      void setLevel​(ITLogger.TLogLevel level)
      Change the level for this ITLogger objects: only messages with a TLogLevel higher or equal to the TLogLevel of the ITLogger will be written/traced.
      void verbose​(String msg)
      Send the msg string to the logger with a default log level set to TLogLevel.VERBOSE.
      void warning​(String msg)
      Send the msg string to the logger with a default log level set to TLogLevel.WARNING.

    • Method Detail

      • setLevel

        void setLevel​(ITLogger.TLogLevel level)
        Change the level for this ITLogger objects: only messages with a TLogLevel higher or equal to the TLogLevel of the ITLogger will be written/traced.
        Parameters:
        level - maximum level of messages that will be traced by this logger object.

      • getLevel

        ITLogger.TLogLevel getLevel()
        Return the "level" up to the log messages passed to this logger will be traced (that is, saved on a file, printed, stored on a database).
        Returns:
        the current LogLevel set for this ITLogger object

      • info

        void info​(String msg)
        Send the msg string to the logger with a default log level set to TLogLevel.INFO.
        Parameters:
        msg - The text message you want to log.

      • warning

        void warning​(String msg)
        Send the msg string to the logger with a default log level set to TLogLevel.WARNING.
        Parameters:
        msg - The text message you want to log.

      • error

        void error​(String msg)
        Send the msg string to the logger with a default log level set to TLogLevel.ERROR.
        Parameters:
        msg - The text message you want to log.

      • fatal

        void fatal​(String msg)
        Send the msg string to the logger with a default log level set to TLogLevel.FATAL.
        Parameters:
        msg - The text message you want to log.

      • verbose

        void verbose​(String msg)
        Send the msg string to the logger with a default log level set to TLogLevel.VERBOSE.
        Parameters:
        msg - The text message you want to log.

      • log

        void log​(ITLogger.TLogLevel level,
         String msg)
        Send the msg string to the logger using the specified level of attention. The message will be traced only if the log level of the logger is higher or equal to the log level of the message.
        Parameters:
        level - The level of attention you want to use for this specific message.
        msg - The text message you want to log.

      • gameLog

        void gameLog​(ITLogger.TLogLevel level,
             String gameId,
             int count,
             int extractedNum,
             String msg)
        Helper method interface that allows for "separate fields" log entries to be written specially by TGame objects during tombola matches, for instance on database tables storing each info in separate table columns.
        Parameters:
        level - the provided message level
        gameId - the String identifying the game that is producing the log entry
        count - typically the counter indicating how many number have been already extracted during the game.
        extractedNum - the last number extracted during the tombola game.
        msg - the String message to log
